Qamb igama ne munon qei wurinou wau oromar diune Yisas wuri nonogursi qamb oromar diamirei. Dearari wonou imbigau yurau eng der oromar qamamirei.
Ende abari Yisas qamara wau ba yaremirei. Yarari wo der wonou yurau wurinob qamar: “Wagari oromar yarunor. Qenu wonou bibist igorunor eng munon gugum wau qamaaman eng gas ende burunor qamb wo qenunget igo.
Eng igar, munon ger Qenu bibis eng wau qomour e qenunga gas ende me ebeiner eng bibis end me igorinerei.”
Ende qamara Yuda munon baraitari ger Yisas qebi qamar: “Ne munon imbigau tari, ne munon uber, ye maigas ebet iigomot qenen igoribam?”
Qamara Yisas taui nob qamar: “Meimet qamb uber yet quran? Munon ger uber ue, Qenu gari qas uber.
Qomon eng gari nonou qoyam eng me eb: yamangar munon ger bauor eng bo me bai, me igeig yom, mi urim me bai, a wurimurimar me qem, nani tain qob qamarari iruges big igu.”
Ende qamara munon eng taui qamar: “Ye wau qomourt igo qomon eng gagar quran eng toat igoum eng isi yarab see ten isigi burem e.”
Yisas qob eng igub nob qamar: “Uber quran ego mi gari qas eng se ebet igoriban eng ete; ne mind eng munon qei wurisab ne qur taui ba munon mi ue eng werisiban. Ende ebeinen eng Qenu ginamt ne bo sau binat igoriban. End ne see yarab ye yetoa qib igorun.”
Munon eng sau binat end Yisas ye toat qib igoar qamara igub igeser qungon degen burab qorei.
Ende ebet qoa Yisas gab toubet qamar: “Munon gugum mind irou igorunor eng Qenu bibis end irunor eng qob qinan.
Munon mind nob eng Qenu wonou bibis end irub qamb eng sig-sig mom qob qinan. A maiben aib gaun eng mingoan mi qer mingoan mai igoun iru qomourt eng ar qasai isiba.”
Munon qei qob eng igub qebi qamamir: “Ende gab eng your uber igoriba?”
Qamarari Yisas qamar: “Munangit mi maigas me ubunerei, misue eng Qenu ar ebeiba.”
Ende qamara Pita der nob qamar: “In munai ginam a mi gugum wogub ne netoat qib igoun eng maigas obouboun?”
Ne Yisas taui qamar: “Io, munon ger Qenu wonou bibis end igorib qenunget eng ginam qiyo, ubeni qiyo, umom umour wogub qiyo unor ur qo wagrari wuriwogub qib igo eng sig uber.
Ende obounon eng Qenu an mi see igo eng wotanami mi sig irou andariba. Andab igama qen geret ansiara qenen bebereg igoruboumon.”
Ende qamb wogub wonou imbigau yurau 12-ende oromar wes opur ete isub wurinob qamar: “Ete qemerine igar. In Yerusalem qite irune qob gigit qamarau munon Munangit Waut qamb gumatemir eng irimanimba.
Baab ba imurimari munon yurau art wurit isiba. Isa ba sumungasi wot tumi mogirt wab wogubour.
Wogub pisirami waramb wogub mom waramari uma tumunimunorei igama qen duor gari ende ubura bo iigomot der bugemba.”
Ende qamara wonou imbigau yurau eng qob eng me imbigau. Qob qanam wurit waberamorei. Ende aba Yisas qob meimit qamb igoar eng me imbigau.
Ende at wogub be Yeriko qani end diab gamir eng munon mag tuum ger tap goant et bugab igo mi yeisar qamb ibirat ab igoai.
Qen end munon yurau aib yar isub abari igub qamar: “Eng meimi obour?”
Qamara munon qei nob qamamir: “Nasaret munon Yisas eng yar ebet igo.”
Ende qamarari Yisas simot eab ar: “Yisas ne Debit wonou wau tumbigi, yet igu.”
Ende ara munon gigit isumir eng wog qamb qoronob qamat qamamir. Ego wo sig-sig mom ab qamar: “Debit wau tumbigi, yet igu.”
Ne Yisas naget wurinob qamara munon eng mot qani yarari munon eng nob qamar:
“Ye ne mai yesi qamb misir igan?” Qamara munon eng qamar: “Ye bo asiemb qamb misir igoum.”
Ende qamara Yisas nob qamar: “Eng ge, nonou oau apand end bo asiemban.”
Ende qamara qand asi mi gab Qenut uber qamb Yisas toat isorei. Isa munon irou gab wuri gor Qenut mismisiramirei.
Yisas Yeriko weib isub bo tumbigi isib qamb isorei.
Ginam end munon qur ba qib igour eng wurinou munon barai tari ger igoai unum Sakius. Wo nomon qur irou igoai.
Qen end wo Yisas eng your ende qamb gib qamb ater ego wo munon qomourt piten end munon yurau irou end opuramirei.
Ende abari ne wo gigit isub nam ger irab erer igo Yisas tap eng isa gib qamb isorei.
Yisas isi yarab Sakius igoar end is naget qiter asi gab qamar: “Qand ag dara see ye nob nonou munai mor isuboun.”
Ende qamara Sakius qand darab gab io qamb borusi mismisirarei.
Munon yamangar ende aba gab mindigar qob wot qamb qamamir: “Wa, munon eng bo is munon mindigar qoat nob munait isar eng gaum, a.”
Mor isub Sakius der naget Yisas nob qamar: “Barai, yonomi gugum qiumuni big wogub wubunobun omboopur munon mi ue eng werisibam. Ne ye munon ger mirimot wonomi eng wot baub igo gab eng ye bo mi qen 4-ende taui utibam.”
Ende qamara Yisas taui qamar: “See qas Qenu munon munai mor e igour eng oromar igo. Munon eng wo gor Abraham wonou tumbigi.
Munangit wau munon yamangar qomon borut igamari wuriubersierib qamb dererei.”
Ende qamara igari ne wo gor Yerusalem isib pisier end bo mi geret big gor wurinob qamara igumirei. Wuri see qas Qenu wonou bibis eng deriba qamb misir igumirei.
Ende abari wurinob qamar: “Munon barai tari ger ginam pa isine king yemaribigar qamb isorei. End igoi wogub qen geret bo yariba.
Qen end wo isib qamb wonou sarau munon 10-ende wurit ara yarari qur wurisab qamar: “An qur e ba sarau ebet ne qur eng imusi bo ui ar baub igamari ye bo yarine qur yeisuboumon.”
Ende qamb wogub isa munon eng wonou ginam eng wuri munon eng king igamau end wuri iet wogub ne bo munon qei wuriimurimari isub qamamir: “In munon eng king igamau end ietoroun.”
Ende qamamir ego, song king maribigari igoi wogub yarerei. Yarab ne wonou sarau munon qur wurisab wogub isuor eng mai sarau ebet bo qur ar ui baub igour qi eng gib qamb
Ne munon qamar wot yar qamar: “Io, barai, ye qur K20-ende yeisen end sarau ebet bo ui ar K200-ende baumei.”
Ende qamara munon eng qamar: “Ne sarau munon uber. End ne mi garit eng musub qoat ne ba aibsiau eng gab ne ye nemaribigine munai ginam 10-ende qoat igoribam.”
Ne bo ger yar nob qamar: “Barai, ne K20 yeisen end ye bo tumbigi sarau ebet K100-ende baumei.
Ende qamara king nob qamar: “Ne ginam 5-ende qoat igoriban.
Ne bo ger yar qamar: “Barai, ne K20 yeisen eng ye suumi wogub wabi wagom oum igo.
Ye ne munon qand-qand mirintra negab igoum end. Munon qei mi bigari ne wurit ba qiyo, mani wurit gonat aba negab igoum end.”
Ne wonob qamar: “Ne sarau munon uber ue. Ne qob quran eng ye musub igibam. Apand ye munon qand mirinet igoum qiyo. A, mind wurinou ye baub igoum qiyo. Ne mani wurinou ye gonat nub igoum qi eng gibam.
Eng ne meimet qamb ye nomon qur netem eng bis qur baiau munai end bigesab igama ye bo ete yarab qur imusi nob baiau ue.
Ende qamb ne munon qani nogumor igour eng wurinob qamar: “Munon eng K20 utem eng wot ba bo munon qamar K200 bauor eng utor.”
Ende qamara wuri qamamir: “Wo mom K200-ende baurei.”
Ende qamarari wo qamar: “Munon mi irou baub qamb obour eng bo sembigi werisibam. A munon mi irou me bainei qamb abar eng mi garit baub igoriner eng ye wot ba munon mi irou baib qamb ebeiner eng utibam.
Yonou munon qarau ye wurinou king igoribine wogour eng oromar yar ye menmant et igaramar.”
Yisas mit big ende qamb wogub ne wo gigit Yerusalem ite irib qamb irarei.
Iri munai ginam Betpage Betani nob ai qaur ger nam Olib man aib igo end irab. Wonou imbigau munon ombur wuriimurima gigit isumirei.
Wuriimuri qamar: “An gigi isub munai ginam geret isub gunon eng wai dongi yeim ger tesi igamari guboumon. Dongi eng qoan munon ger irer me bugab qib igamau. Eng gab neri ba diarar.
An neri igamari munon ger animbag, “Meimet neri igoumon?” Ende qamara gab an nob qamarar, “Munon barai sarau nob gab qamara ba irub qamb neri igoun,” ende qamarar.”
Ende qamb wuriimurima isub mi gugum Yisas wurinob qamar gas ende eretersi ugamirei igama gamirei.
Isub dongi eng gab simarur nerub igamari ibag qamamir: “Meimet neri igoumon?”
Qamarari wuri qamamir: “Munon barai qoru nob diarar ende qamara yar nob irub at igoun.”
Ende qamarari wagari nerub ba irab mingoan norumi wai erer oromari Yisas erer ir bugamorei.
Bugab isa mingoan norumi tapet oromari erer isorei.
Isi Yerusalem qani ai tap ai qaur nam olib man aib igo end isub igour sorai end isa munon yurau aib toat qib igour eng end qanam big Qenut mi uber inimbiga gaminei qamb wot uber qamb mismisir ab qamamir:
Qenu ininou king ininou munon Barai unumut nonogursia yara. Oau mein Qenut ne wonou ginam end igoriner.
Ende qamb ab abari Parisi qei erobon end der Yisas nob qamamir: “Imbigau munon, nonou yurau e wuritaisia wogunor.”
Ende qamarari Yisas wurinob qamar: “Ye wuritaisine wagari mai nomon e gagar wuri uput qamb toaubigubari ende qi eng ende oboum qi.”
Isi Yerusalem pisi ne asi ginam aib gab wot eerei.
Eab qamar: “O Yerusalem munon, an see qas Qenu nob qibanamsiau werei eng imbig ende qi eng uber qi. Werei eng anit waber igo end me gunanei.
Qen ger gab eng aninou munon qarau yar anqoui ugoubour.
Ende at ne aninou yurau wurinob igoumon eng wuri gumutumai ugoubour. Ende at ne see nomon ger, ger erer igo eng wagari me igorinerei. Qenu wo an ubersieriner eng an qoyam ue end ende ansiorubour.”
Ende qamb wogub inorou munai mor isub munon oai qi gab mi qi wurisab taui baub igamari orotoar arir wurinob qamar: “Qenu qamara ete gumatemirei, “yonou munai mor eng munon end is igo yesimot ab igoarar qamb gari. An bo ba sumungasi abari munon mi urim baiau munai gas ebet igoumon.” Ende qamarei.
<range>
Yisas inorou munai end qenen qob wuriimbig igoai. Ende at igama munon Qenut mian yab igour barai tari eng ne qomon imbigau eng ne munon qei wurinou barai tari eng gagar Yisas waramb at igurei.
Ende ebetemir ego maigas me waramau. Munon gugum wo qob qamara musub mom iruges big igub igour end.
Qen geret Yisas inorou munai mor end igo Qenu qob wurinob qamb wuriimbig ende at igama ne munon Qenut mian yab igour barai tari eng ne qomon imbigau eng ne barai tari qei ende qiumuni diamirei.
Diab Yisas nob qamamir: “Ne mai gas igo sarau eng gagar ebet qib igoa, eng ininob qamara igun? Your sarau eng eb qamb qamara ebet igoan?”
Qamarari Yisas taui qamar: “An eng qamarari ye bo ete an qebi qemerini: Yon munon yat wurinonogursi igoar eng mai Qenu io qamara ebet igoai qiyo, munangit?”
<range>
Ende qamara wurinou der agunub qamamir: “Wa, eng qura eng in mai qomoruboun? In ete qomorun eng, Qenu qomorun eng, wo ete qemeriba, “eng gab an meimet qamb Yont me oa bigoumon?” ende qemeriba.
A, ‘munangit et’ qomorun eng munon yurau aib e Yon qob miteri qamarau munon end wot oabig igour end nomont iningarambour.”
Ende qamb wogub ne taui qamamir: “In sir qoyam ue eret dererei qi.”
Ende qamarari Yisas wurinob qamar: “End ne ye your yiimbiga mi eng ebet igoum qi eng me aninob qemerinei.”
Ende qamb ne mi geret big wurinob qamar: “Munon ger man suab wogub wain ubub wogub munon qei qoat sarau baab wurisab mi taui baub igoarar qamb wogub wo ginam pa iua gurum igoai.
Wain ubub wogub iuar eng qen yara ne wonou sarau munon ger imurimine isa munon wain man qoat igour eng wain git qei ba utor qamb imuriamorei. Imurima isa munon man qoat igour eng der munon eng borusi waramb sumungasi wogub mi ger me utau, ar imurimari isorei.
Ende abari isa gab bo ger imuriamor eng gor waramb sumungasi wogub mi ger me utau, ar imurimari isorei.
Ende gab ne bo ger imuriamor eng mom waramb mumusi wogub mumun ba ag ariramari isorei.
Ende gab wain man ur eng der, “mai ebeibam” qamb ne qamar: “Ende gab eng yonou wau ten ait imuriemin eng tuan ende me ne siorunor.”
Ende qamb wonou wau ten imurima isa gab wurinou qob-qob qamamir: “Wonou wau ten eng igo tuan ur uma wain man e wo baiba, wagari waramb arir wain man e ininou baun.
Ende qamb baab ba ag ariramari isa waramb mumusiamirei.” Yisas ende qamb wuri qebi qamar: “Munon eng ende abari wain man ur eng der munon eng mai wurisieriba?” ende qamb qamar:
“Wo yar munon eng igaramb ugab wogub wain man eng bo munon qei wurit wegiba.” Ende qamara munon qei igub qamamir: “Sig ue ar. Eng ende me ebeiner.”
Ende qamarari Yisas ibag bis arir wuri qebi qamar: “Meimet qamb Qenu qob eng ende at qura? Mon mindau munon nomon ger boru qamb arir wagomirei igama bo munon ger nomon eng uber gab qoren unatari yamorei.
Munon qei erer end qib yarisiorunor eng mom umubour. Ne nomon eng uburab isub igaraminer eng mom sairir uburubour.”
Ende qamara qomon imbigau munon ne Qenut mian iset big igour munon gigit igour eng igumir eng Yisas qob eng qamar eng wurit mi big qamara igub baab waramb ebetemirei. Ego munon qei wurit yari wugumirei.
Ende at ne musub qoat igurei. Igo munon qei wurinomit in munon qoregen qamb igour eng wuriqereimari yar toat nan gab igurei. Igo qob maigas qamara igub mot gabman baraitari aib end isub qob misitoub qamb.
Ne munon Yisas qob soageni qamara igub qamb toat gab igour eng yar Yisas nob qamamir: “Imbigau munon, in mom imbigoun ne qob qamb inimbigan eng sig uber. Munon barai tari im ibag me qamb igoan. Ne Qenu wonou misir apand eng qas wuri nob qamb igoan.
End ne ne misir maigas igan, ininou qomon eng toat nomon qur Rom gabman utun eng uber qiyo?”
Ende qamarari Yisas mirimot qamamir eng diban ibag wogub wurinob qamar:
“Nomon qur eng yesirbigari gine. Your wonou qugur nonou qurt end igo?” Qamara wuri qamamir: “Rom gabman baraitari Sisar qugur igo.”
Ende qamarari Yisas qamar: “Uber, ende gab eng Sisar wonomi eng sir utar, a Qenu wonomi gab eng wonou sir utab ende abar.”
Ende qamara igumir eng Yisas mi soagen ger qamara igub uyort bigun qamb ebetemir eng qob soagen ger me qamara igub qitet mitembur maget igurei.
Ne munon Sadyusi yurau qei munon umb bo me der bugomunorei qamb igour eng yar Yisas qebiamir:
“Imbigau munon, Moses qomon ger init ete qamb gumatarerei: Munon ger yamangar baub wogub ubeni wau me bainenei igama wo uma ne bo umour yamangar qindou eng baia ne wot wau bainer eng wau eng umami qamar uminer eng wonou wau. Moses qob ende init gumaterei.
End ne, mai qiyo, munon ger wau 7-ende. Wau qamar yamangar bauor eng wau me baiau igama umorei.
Uma wau yab bo umom yamangar qindou eng baurei.
Eng gor ende sig, ubeni wau me baiau igama umorei. Ne bo wau qag baurei. Mom ende at is-isi wau isar mom sindomun bauor eng gor wau ue igo umorei.
Munon mom gugum ende umb uburari ne sindomund wurinou yamangar qindou eng gor umorei.
End ne, mai qiyo, qen geret munon gugum bo der bogomari ne yamangar eng der bogoma your wonou bo baiba, mai wau 7-ende baumir eng wurinou bo baubour qiyo?”
Ende qamarari ne Yisas taui qamar: “Munon yamangar qen see qibaub igour.
A munon yamangar umb wogub bo der bugomunor eng wuri bo sabar me qibaunorei.
Wuri gugum enger gas ende gari burab wogub bo sabar me umunorei. Umb der bugomunor end Qenu wau sisinam.
End ne Moses munon umb der bugomunor end qamarei. Qoan Moses nam ger oab igama gea Munon aib qob ger nob qamar eng “Ye Abraham, Aisak ne Yekop wurinou munon Baraitari.”
Eng qamar eng qanam eng Qenu wo me umb igo, qenen bebereg igo, end munon gugum wot bebereg igorubour.”
Ende qamara qomon imbigau munon qei qamb amir: “Imbigau munon, ne qob eng taui quran eng sig uber.”
Ende qamb bo qebi qamarau end qubig wogomirei.
Ende abari Yisas bo wurinob qamar: “Maigas igama gab munon Qenu inubersierib maribigor eng wo Debit tubig wot qamb igour?
Debit wonou qoan buk Sam end ete qamb gumaterei: Munon Aib igo yonou Munon aibt ete qamarei: yonou uberegent wes et bugab igama nonou munon qarau ye wuriimurimine nonou goten yau erobon end igamau gas end igorubour.
<range>
End ne bo maigas gab Debit wonou tumbigi eng bo der “Krais yonou Munon Baraitari” wot qamb igo?”
Ende qamara munon gugum igub igamari ne wonou wuriimibigau yurau eng bo sir wurinob qamar:
“An qomon imbigau munon yurau end wurit qoyamet igoarar. Wuri ete ne obounor. Wuri mingoan degen naget wogub munon qen inimbagaiar qamb munon qiumuni igamari magqurt end naget, a inorou munait end isub mag qur end bugab a mi bingen at nub eng nam qab deberit end bugumune inimbagaiar qamb ende oboubour.
Ne gor yamangar qindou wurimurimar qamarari apand qamb munai wurit wagari end igorubour. Ne Qenut qebi qomorub eng qob degen aib qamb bisub igorubour. Ende ebet igorunor eng qob musiau qen end wuri dorogorubour,” ende qamarei.
Yisas inorou munai aib mor end naget ibag igama munon mind nob eng nomon qur irou bis Qenut bigari, ne yamangar qindou ger nomon qur qomourt ombur-ombur qas bis arirama garei.
<range>
Gab wurinob qamar: “Apand aninob quraum, yamangar qindou e qur bigar eng an gugum qur bigoumon eng antanamima.
Qanam eng an qur irou igo end tau big tau igama aninou mi ba nuboumon. A, wo ende ue, gari igemerei eng mani ba nibam qamb me wagau. Gugum mom arir ue gar end antanamima,” ende qamarei.
Munon qei inorou munai aib nomon aib-aib qenenginobt mindatemir eng gab a Qenut nomon qur big eng abari gab qoagurui qamarari Yisas wurinob qamar:
“Mi eng gugum gab qoaguruimoumon eng, qen geret bapami nomon qei wagari erer me igorinerei, gugum mom ago oum der inumutri igoriba.”
Ende qamara wuri qebi qamamir: “Imbigau munon, qen mait mi eng gagar quran eng aba guboun? Ne gor mi eng gagar ebeib qamb meimemit in mirorub gab imbig igoruboun?”
Ne wo taui qamar: “An ete mirorub gab eng qoyamet igoarar, qen quraum eng yariba eng munon irou yar anmurimar ete qomorubour, munon yariba qamarari igub igoumon eng gari ye yoroum e. Ende qamarari an igatar wagar.
Ne gor munon ginam-ginam aib qamb yogorari qob toau igub gor me yarimar. Mi eng gagar ebeteriomunor eng qen sindomund eng se qiren igoriba.”
Ende qamb imusi qamar: “Munon ai aib geret igour eng der geret igour eng wurinob yogub a king ger yurau eng der king ger yurau eng wurinob yogub ende ebeterimbour.
Ne ai aib qamb uyab ai qaur duret munon wuri uiebig a ginam qei qunumber qen aib yar a toar aib qamb igab ne gor tatet qitend gunon eng yarimar qamb mi mirortar ende ebeterimba.
Mi eng gagar quraum eng me yarinerei igama gigit an ansumungasiorubour. An ye qob igub ye yetoat ende at igamari munon qarau yar anbaab anamar inorou munai qoat igour munon eng wurit isub anwagari aningarambour, ne gor uyort anbigubour. Ende at ne anamar gabman munon baraitari a qob musitarau munon wurit isubour.
Wuri ende anamar isari qen end yonou qob uber eng sabar-sabar wurinob qamarar.
Wuri ende ansiarari qob maigas wurinob qomorun qamb misir me igar.
An wuri magqurt naget igamari yonou gari ansierine misir uber igub qob qeretut nob qamarari aninou munon qarau igub me ombarir ne me anbumaimunorei.
Ne aninou tain nanib ne munon banam wurinou anduimari munon qarau an qei aningarambour.
Ende at ne an yet mom igub abari animbag ye yesiningot ne ansumungasiorubour.
Ende ansiorunor eng Qenu anoar igoriba.
Ende aba ne an munon qarau wurit yari ne qer gimiet yonou qob uber qomorunon eng isi yarab bo igomot igoruboumon.”
Ende qamb qamar: “An igo qen geret gunon eng yogorau munon yar ginam aib Yerusalem qon ariramari gab eng, ‘qo munai ginam borusiorubour qen eng piara,’ ende qomoruboumon,” qamar.
“Ende abari munon Yuda wuri iua ai qaurent irubour. Ne munon ginamt igorunor eng iua amug isubour. A munon ai geret igorunor eng bo qen end di ginam aib end me isunorei.
Qen eng yariner eng Qenu wau waramir end taui qamb ne gor qob qoan gumatemir eng irimaniom qamb
Qen end yamangar qurag igour eng nob wau se ba inau wurisab igour eng nob wuri borumesis. Qenu wo misiringeteriner eng munon ag e qomon eng ebetemir eng wurit qoot-qoot isiba.
Bui qaurit wurigumar, ne qei uyort wuribig oromar munon ginam qei magqurt wuri nagasi igorubour. Ne munon ar Yuda ue eng wuri yar Yerusalem di igamari wurinou qen ubura ne wogubour.”
Ende qamb qamar: “Qen eng yariba, worom, inaun, tapai qamb eng gagar mirarubour. Ne ago e uyer ya iger yar toaima igub munon yamangar gugum borusi mom yarimbour.
Ag e mi gugum undounder uburab a tapai erer qite norumor dara gab yari mag uburab uburiba.
Mi eng gagar gabri ende ebet igamari Munangit Wau waberet qenengi nob ne wonou qiribiten deriba.
Mi eng gagar qanam big ende mirorub gab eng an matarub qitermar. Qenu anamar iribeiner eng mi ende guboumon,” ende qamarei.
Yisas qob eng ende wurinob qamb wogub mi geret big qamar: “An nam togun nob nam ar qei nob ibagaiar.
Nam eng gagar warari eng ‘qo worom qen pi’ ende qamb igoumon.
Ende gas ende gari, mi eng gagar miroriari ibag “qo Qenu inamar iribar eng piara” ende qamarar.
Eng apand aninob quraum, munon see igour eng qei me umunorei igama mi eng yariba.
Qen eng yara ai tat nob mom uburiner ego, yonou qob piten ger bais me uburinerei.
End ne an musub qoyamet igoarar. An ya uter nub qanganget qiyo, a git goant igub mi niau qamb mingoant asi igamari qen eng yara gab gegirunon qamb. Aninou git goant qas igunon eng, Qenu wonou qen eng yariner eng munon ger toar nob qib igama ubuemi toar qogom igub wot ibig yar goa gas ende sieriba.
Qen eng yariner eng munon ai gugum mom yariba.
End ne qen gugum song ar me igoarar, qoyamet qenen Qenu simot eari annonogursi igoriner. Ende at igorunon eng qen eng yar an qubeima Munangit Wau menmant iruboumon.”
Qen end Yisas wo ai qaur nam Olib man igo end inab igo ne oru yar inorou munai end qob wurinob qamb igoai.
Munon yamangar gugum itum der qob qamara igub qamb isub igurei.
Qoan ir Qenu wonou enger tain qoanb wuri qubei wagerei qamb misir igub mi aib qamb at nub igour qen eng pi burerei.
Ende gab ne munon baraitari Qenu munai qoat igour eng ne qomon qerei imbig igour eng nob Yisas qand waramb etemir end munon yurau qei Yisast oabig igour end wurit yariamirei.
Ende abari ne Yisas wonou imbigau yurau end ger unum Yudas Iskariot qamb igour eng Satan wot diarei.
Diara wo Yisas duimb qamb isub munon Qenut mian yab igour gigit eng ne Qenut igau munai qoat igour eng wurit isub Yisas waramau end qob musierib isorei.
Is qamara wuri mismisir nomon qur taui utub qamb qamamirei.
Qamarari wo io qamb wogub isub wo qen ger munon yurau aib Yisas nob me igamari qen end duimb qamb qoat igoai.
Ende at qib igama qen qau, ‘Qenu enger tonoanb me igaramau’ qamb mismisir mani parau yis ue tor nub igour eng yarerei. Qen end wai sipsip wan baab warambour.
Ne Yisas Pita Yon nob wuriimurimb qamar: “An ombur isub qen qau end mi nun eng arsiarar.”
Qamara wuri qamamir: “In ombur eret isub mi arsiorun?”
Qamarari wo qamar: “An isub isi ginam aib end weib isub gunon eng munon ger ya egit unab ba isub igo animbegeiba. Animbag isa gab eng wo toat isi wo mor isa gab eng an nob isar.
Isub munai ur eng nob qamarar: “Imbigau munon nenet ete qurai munai tumbigi eret in mi arsi igo qen qau end yonou imbigau yurau eng wurinob mi nibam?”
Ende qamarari wo munai tumbigi aib ger erer qitend nam qab bogomau eng ne mi big niau eng ereteri ar igo eng ansirbiga mi end arsi igamari nuboun.”
Ende wurinob qamara wuri isub gamir eng Yisas wurinob qamar gas ende gab mi end arsiamirei.
Qen eng yara Yisas wonou wuri imbigau yurau eng nob end bugab mi numirei.
Mi nub igo wurinob qamar: “Ye e bugab mi aninob nib qamb qenungoum, mi nub wogub git goan uter yeneriba.
Bo ete qemerine igar, ye bo sabar mi me aninob ninei, isi yarab qen Qenu wonou bibis biginer qen end mi git dibenara guboumon.”
Ende qamb Yisas qogum ger ba wain ya wari wogub Qenut uber qamb wogub wurisab qamar: “An ya e ba bais-bais niar.
See ne qen geret gor wain ya me aninob ninei. Isi yarab Qenu wonou bibis biginer eng yara gab.”
Ende qamb mani parau ba Qenut qamb boroumi wurisab qamar: “E yonou git goan, an ba niar, nub yet misir igub igoarar qamb.
Eng ende at ne bo wain ya qogum ten ba bo eng gas ende ebeterei. Ende at wurisab qamar: “Ya e yonou qeru isiner end maribig andoroum. Qenu wo anit igub yonou qeru aba anit igerama eng gab qoan tonoan wurit qob nausier eng boair wogub bo bubun anubersierib qamb anit iyeterei igo.
End ne an gaiar, munon ye yeduimbar eng ye nob nam qab garit bugab igoun eng.
Qenu wonou Munangit Wau uminer qamb duiamor end. Ego munon ye yeduima yanamunor eng, munon eng borumesis.”
Ende qamara qei der qamamir: “Wa, your qomon eng wot sieriba?” ende at qebi-qebi igurei.
Ne Yisas wonou yurau eng der wurinomit, your ger baraitari igoriner end qamb agunub igurei.
Ende at igamari Yisas der wurinob qamar: “Munon ai qent igour eng wurinou baraitari igama sarau borusi betet igour. Wo qob qamara taut qas ende ebet igour. Munon baraitari igama wonou yurau der wot ‘munon inubersiau tari’ ende wot qamb igour.
Eng an qomon ende ue. An ete abar. Munon ger baraitari gigit igo munon qei oroar igorib ebeiner eng wonou bumai wogub wau gogor gas ende burab munon qei sarau batar igoriba.
Your baraitari? Munon bugab mi nub igo eng qiyo a munon mani imi bear utab igo eng baraitari? Ue, munon bugab mi nub igo eng wo baraitari. Eng gas ende, see ye aninob igoum eng baraitari me igoum, an mi sigetar igoum.
Qoan ye ye mi warigesier eng an ye me yewogub qoau.
Qoan Tain wonou bibis eng ye yiimbig munon oroar igoar qamb yemaribigor gas ende ye bo bibis eng animbig an munon oroar igoarar qamb anmaribigoum.
Eng an yonou bibis end igo mani ya qamb nuboumon. Ende at ne an segagam baraitari igo Isrel munon yurau 12 eng qob musitar igoruboumon.
Ende qamb Saimont qamar: “Ne igu, an yurau eng gugum Satan anqubei anwarigesi anqereimb qamb qamarei igo.
Ego ye qo Qenu ne nonogursi qamb qebi qamamei. End ne ne Qenut mom oabig igoriban. Igoi bo igeser yar banamori wuri nonogursieriban.”
Ende qamara Pita taui qamar: “Barai, ye ne nonob uyort isub ombur umun qamb ar erer igoum e.”
Ne Yisas nob qamar: “Pita, git uber ye nob quran, ego teteri se me erinerei igama qen ombur gari yet ‘munon eng ye sir ue’ ende qamara teteri qamar eriba.”
Yisas Pita sir ende nob qamb wogub ne garisi wuri nob qamar: “Qoan ye saraut munon ginam-ginam iuar qamb animuriam eng an nomon qur ger me baiau ne abau ger ue, ne goten yau ue. Ne mi gugum ue ar qib igoumon qen end mi ue gab qoot asi abatamanei?” Ende qamara wuri qamamir: “Ue.”
Ende qamarari Yisas qamar: “End ne see munon nomon qur igama gab qiyo abau igama gab eng bainer. Ne munon ger bui qauri ue gab eng wonou mingoan eng wurisab taui qur ba bui qauri ger bainer.
Qanam eng, Qenu qob gumatemirei igo ‘munon boru wurinob garisi warambour.’ Ende igo end ne qeemben ende yesiorubour. Qenu qob gugum ye yesiorunor end qamb gumatemir eng ye me ye bisinerei.”
Ende qamara wonou imbigau yurau eng qamamir: “Barai, e ge in bui qauri ombur-ombur igo e.” Ne wo qamar: “Eng mom quraun eng.”
Ende qamb wogub qenen at igo gas ende, der isa wonou yurau qanam toat isi ai qaur nam Olib man aib igo end isumirei.
Ginamt weib isub wurinob qamar: “Qenu nob qamb igorunon eng an mi warigesia wot me uburab isunanei.”
Ende wurinob qamb wogub wuri igamari wonou wes opur isub gamaur wat bugab Qenu nob qamar:
“Tain a, yet igub gab eng qugurau e yet yaribar eng toat arirom. Eng ye ar net quraum, nonou qas.”
Ende qamara Qenu ginamt enger ger der nonogursiarei.
Yisas sig-sig mom quguraget wogub Qenu sabar-sabar nob qamb igama git goan gugum qoaru qeru di darau nami ende ebeterei.
Ne der naget wonou yurau isub ibagar eng wuri git goan bibinat wogub qoan naat inemirei.
Ende ibag wurinob qamar: “An der bugab Qenu nob qamb me ubunanei i-i? Mi anwarigesiau ger anit dieriner qamb quraum.”
Ende qamb igama munon yurau aib diamirei. Yisas wonou imbigau yurau end ger unum Yudas wo iuar eng isub munon yurau wurinerub ba diarei. Diab Yisas qani irab baab wuriimbigib ebeterei.
Aba Yisas nob qamar: “Yudas, ne Munangit Wau munon qarau wurit imbigib aban ne?”
Ende qamara wonou yurau nob igour eng der Yisas waramb diamir eng imbig ne nob qamamir: “Barai, in bui qaurit wuri gumarun qiyo.”
Ende qamb ne munon ger bui qauri beneri Qenut mian yab igour wurinou baraitari wonou sarau munon ger iruges uberegent wes eng soabur ariramorei.
Ende aba Yisas gab qamar: “An qomon eng wagar,” qamb munon iruges soabur ariramir eng ba bo big bea qoan wonou igoa gas ende uberetarei.
Ende at ne Qenu mian iset bigetet igour wurinou baraitari eng ne inorou munai qoat igour eng ne munon baraitari qei Yisas booub qamb diamir eng wurinob qamar: “An bui qauri ba qombuni ba mai munon igeig nob yogurub ende at diaumon?
Ye qenen inorou munait erogori igoun eng an ger yanamb ende abari me animbegeau. Itum qen eng munon qomon boru oboub qamb eng me qubigunorei. End ne see qen eng yara gab yanamb diaumon.”
Ende qamb waga baab mot Qenut mian yab igour wurinou gigit wonou munai end isumirei. Isari Pita qanam mugenderi toat ibag-ibag isub igoai.
Qob musub igour munai mor igama youn man end mut gumet qoariget igamari Pita isub ibag wurinob mut qoariget igurei.
Pita ende bugab igama sarau yamangar ger qib garei. Gab bo nan gab nob qamar: “Wa, munon qira munon e nob yorour eng qoat igo qii?”
Ende qamara Pita qand der mirimot qamar: “Munon eng ye sir ue.”
Ende qamb igo bais umi-umi ende at bo munon ger qib gab nob qamar: “Ne gor munon e nob yorour eng wonou yurau.” Ende qamara Pita qamar: “Ue e.”
Ende qamb wogub igamari qen dirigor bais ete umi wogub munon ger gab gagam mom qamat qamar: “Segagam eng Galili munon Yisas nob igama gaun eng gari.”
Ende qamara Pita nogom gumotopurma qamar: “Wa, ne qob eng at quran eng ye sir me imbigoum.” Ende qamara teteri qamar arei.
Qen end Yisas mor ito igo igeser asi Pita sir garei. Gea Pita wo gab misir igorei. Qoan Yisas ete nob qamar end: “Teteri me erinerei igama ne qen ombur gari ende yet ‘munon eng wot quraumon eng ye sir ue,’ ende yet qamara teteri qamar eriba.”
Ende nob qamar end, qen end Pita misir igub igeser ag isub borusi eerei.
Munon Yisas mot yaremir eng Yisas ber qob wot qamb wot igerig igurei.
Ne qei der mingoant mag taisi touri wogub waramb wogub bo beasimetet nob qamamir: “Your nanamai qi eng sir gumat qamara gun.”
Ende qamb qiyo, ne qomon boru-boru qei wot ebet sumungasi ende at igurei.
At igamari uriger worom diara ne Yuda munon baraitari eng ne, Qenut mian yab igour wurinou gigit eng ne qomon qerei igour eng qiumuni Yisas mot isub wurinou baraitari qob musitoub qamb qiumuni igour wobon end bis nagsiari qebi qamamir: “Ne mai, munon wurimusiau tari qiyo?” Qamarari wo qamar: “Ye aninob qemerine yet me oabigunanei.
<range>
Ne ye an qebi qemerine gor musub taui me ye nob qomurunanei.
Eng gab see ne qen gugum Munangit Wau Qenu uberegent end bugab mom du qamb wegiba.”
Ende qamara gugum der qamamir: “Ie, ne apand Qenu wau?” Ne wo taui qamar: “An see quraumon eng, ye eng gari.”
Ende qamara wuri qamamir: “Mai munon geret igub ebein, wonou qabarit qamara in gugum mom diban igoun eng.” Ende qamamirei.
Ende qamara ne gugum der Yisas mot Rom gabman munon tarinob Pailat wot isumirei.
Isub qanambig qamamir: “Munon e in mot yoroun eng qanam eng ete, in munon yamangar gugum wuri ba songesi ete qamb igo: “An Sisar nomon qur utab igoumon eng wagar qamb qiyo a wonomit Qenu munon wuriubersierib qamb imurima derer eng ye gari, ye baraitari” ende at qamb igo end nob yoroun.”
Ende qamarari Pailat Yisas qebi qamar: “Ie, ne Yuda wurinou baraitari gigit qiyo?” Ne Yisas taui qamar: “Nonou gari quran eng”.
Ende qamara Pailat der Qenut mian yab igour wurinou baraitari eng nob munon yurau wurinob garisi qamar: “Munon e ye gaum eng qomon boru ger me abau.”
Ende qamara wuri der nob agunub qamamir: “Ende mai, qoan Galili munon wurinob qamb a Yuda munon wurinob qamb is isi yar e bo yar qurar eng meimi?”
Ende at qamarari igub Pailat wuri qebi qamar: “Munon e mai Galili munon qiyo?”
Ende qamara qamarari igub wogub mom imbigorei. “Io munon eng Herot wonou yurau” ende qamb imurima Herot isorei. Qen end Herot wo Yerusalem eng igoar end.
Herot Yisas isa gab borusi uberetarei. Yisast qob suari igub gib qamb at igoar end. Ne bo Yisas mi wes ger aba gib qamb
End ne Herot mi irou Yisas qebiamorei. Ego Yisas qob ger taui me qamarau.
Ende aba gab Qenut mian yab igour baraitari eng ne qomon imbig igour eng bo ir-ir naget Yisas qomon boru-boru ebet qib igo qamb meten wot qamamirei.
Ende at ne Herot wonou yogorau yurau eng nob der qob song-song wot qamb ber qob wot qamamirei. Qamb ne bo mingoan qenenginob sig uber ger ba qumanimetet wogub bo imurimari Pailat qani isorei.
Qoan Herot Pailat nob qarau igurei isi yarab qen end qas qibanamsiamirei.
Ende at ne Pailat munon Qenut mian yamau baraitari eng ne munon baraitari qei ne munon yamangar ar ende wurit qamara yarari wurinob qamar:
“An munon e mot yet yarab quraumon eng: Munon e qomon soagensi munon wurinob qamb qib igo qamb qob musitoub quraumon eng. Ye aninou magqurt qebi nob quraum eng, wo qomon boru ger ebet igo qamara me igoum.
Herot qebimar eng ue gab bo init imurima yarar eng gor. End ne in ar waramun eng uber ue eng gab quraum.
End ne ye ar pisirami qas waramb wogub anit imurimine isiba,” ende qamarei.
Togun gugum Qenu enger tain qoanb wuri qubei wagerei qamb mi at nub ne Pailat munon uyort igour eng ger wurit imurima isub igo.
Pailat ende qamara munon yurau eng gugum der amir: “Waramari uma ne in Barabas qas init imurimari yariner.”
Barabas wo uyort bigumir eng wo gabman nob agunub a munon qei igarama umari gab ba bigumirei.
Ende qamarari Pailat Yisas ar wogub imurimine wurit isiner qamb bo sabar wurinob qamarei.
Qamar ego wuri der nob agunub amir: “Nam erer qas big waramar, nam erer qas big waramar.”
Ende qamarari Pailat bo qen ombur garit wurinob qamar: “Meimet qamb munon e qomon boru ger ebeterei? Ye gaum eng waramau werei ende ger me gaum. Ende ne aninou waramb qamb ibitiriaumon end ye ar pisiramit qas waramb wogub ar anit imurimine isiba.”
Ende qamara wuri mom warama umb qas weginer qamb ibitiriamirei. Ende at Pailat qob ba songesi wagari wagerei.
Wogub wurinou qob qamamir eng toat wurit wagerei.
Wogub ne munon ger gabman nob agunub a munon igaramb at qib igama uyort bigumir eng bo ar wurit waga isorei. Ne Yisas um qamb mom ibitiriari ibag imurima yogorau munon wurit isorei.
Yisas wurit isa mot isub qataben gamir eng Sairini munon ger unum Saimon. Wo diab ginam aib eng isib at igoai. Ende gab ne Yisas nam togoramor eng nob bai qamb end qamat qamarari wo bo ba Yisas toat isorei.
Isari munon yamangar irou toat isub igo yamangar irou eab-eab uru wab ende at qanam isub igurei.
Ende at isub igamari Yisas igeser wurinob qamar: “An Yerusalem yamangar, an yet me eaiar. An aninomit eab ne aninou wau end wurit eaiar.
Qen ger gab anit ete qomorubour: yamangar wau me baunerei, a wau me baiau, ne wau inau me wurisinerei, yamangar eng wuri mismisirubour.
Qen end munon qei der ai qaur aib-aib end wurit qomorubour: ‘duret in umimar.’ Ne gor ai qaur qamaaman end wurit qomorubour: ‘duret iningaramar.’
Eng gaiar, wuri ye nam igom gas ende igimine yesiaur eng Yuda munon wuri nam umau gas ende igamari sig mom wuriquguragsiorubour.” Yisas ende wurinob qamarei.
Qen end munon ombur qomon boru at qib igour eng nob isub Yisas nob igaramb qamb.
Ende oromar isub isi ai qauren ger ‘tari qer’ qamb igour end isub ne Yisas nam tenori big waramb ne munon ombur eng, ger uberegent wes end big waramb ne ger uben qagit end big waramb ende ebetemirei.
Yisas nam erer end igo qamar: “Tain, munon e yesiaur eng wuri qanam sir me imbig ne yesiaur, ne taui me wuri sumungasi.” Ende qamara wuri der Yisas mingoan wot baub qamb ne sauab your wotanami mingoan eng bainer qamb ebetemirei.
Ende abari munon qei qoat naget igo ne Yuda munon baraitari eng der Yisas ber qob wot qamamir: “Munon qei wuri musub qib igoar eng wagari wonomi musia gune. ‘Ye Krais, Qenu munon gugum wurimusi qamb yemaribigorei’ qamb qib igoar end.”
Ende qamarari yogorau munon wuri gor der ber qob wot qamamir:
“Ne Yuda wurinou baraitari igo gab eng nonomi musub der ge?” Ende wot qamb igurei.
Yisas big waramirt erer end qob ger ete qamb gumat bigumirei: MUNON E YUDA WURINOU BARAITARI, ende qamb gumatemirei.
Munon boru ombur wuri big waramir eng ger igo Yisast ber qob wot qamar: “Ne munon wuri musiau tari, end ne nonomi ubersi ne in ombur in musi.”
Ende qamara munon ger igo qamat qamar: “Ne Qenut misir me igan? In gugum ininou qomon boru ebet igoun end taui qamb qeemben inquguragsiaur. Ego wo ende ue wonou ar meten siaur end uber ue.”
<range>
Ende qamb Yisas nob qamar: “Yisas, ne mom baraitari burab nonou bibis end isub gab eng yet misir igu.”
Ende qamara Yisas der taui qamar: “Apand nonob quraum, see qas in ombur ginam uberar end igoruboun.” ende qamarei.
Qen end worom ginam tog yarab ne ai gugum iturama worom mag bo me geau. Ende igama igoi isii worom bo qumat dara ne mingoan gurum aib inorou munai tend opur uriamir eng metut qitend quburab isii waseramorei.
<range>
Ende aba gab igamari Yisas qugiab qamb ar: “Tain, yonou moui uber ne bai.” Ende qamb ab wogub umorei.
Yogorau munon baraitari eng mi eng ende aba gab wogub Qenut oabig qamar: “Segagam, munon e munon qoregen uber,” ende qamarei.
Munon gugum qoui naget qoat igour eng mi eng ende aba gab qumor-qumor isumirei.
Ne Yisas wonou munon banam ne yamangar qei Yisas mot yarari ginam Galili wogub yaremir eng mugenderi nami ende naget igo mi eng aba gab igurei.
Qen end Yuda munon ger unum Yosep. Wonou ginam qenen eng Arimatea. Wo munon qoregen uber. Ne gor, wo Yuda munon baraitari qob musitarub qamb qiumuni igour eng wurinou erogori.
Wo igo baraitari qei Yisast qob qamb nausi ebetemir eng wo io me qamarau. Wo qoan Qenu wonou bibis bigor eng ba dibesierib qamar eng qoat igoai.
Munon eng wo Yisas uma wogub mumun bis tumunimb qamb is Pailat qebi garei.
Qebi gea io qamara isub mumun erer igoar eng bo ag big ne mingoan oan nob end ouri wogub bisub tumuniamorei. Tumun eng qoan nomon erobon goanetemirei. Munon ger me tumunimau, bubun igoai.
Qen eng Fraide, barim eng inorou qen end gitab ibeibi igorub etemir eng pisiarei.
Galili yamangar Yisas nob yarari toat yaremir eng Yosep Yisas mumun bis tumunimb isa nob isumirei. Isub maigas at tumunieminer eng musub gab imbigub qamb.
Ende gab wogub ginamt irab maurem ya qamb mi eng gagar arsi igo Yisas git goan bieriner qamb qositoub qamb. Ne inorou qen eng wurinou qomon igo end gitab ar ibeibi igurei.
Inemirei igo itum der inorou qen pura ne yamangar welya qamb barim urigom arsi bigumir eng ba munon teteret end isamirei.
Isab gamir eng nomon aib ger ba yar tumun qipiatemir eng bo ende me igamau. Tumun unat igama gamirei.
Gab isab erobon isub gamir eng Munon barai Yisas git goan me igamau.
Ende gab qanganget wogub naget igamari qand munon ombur mingoan oan qenengi nob nagetemirei igo wuri qani end naget igurei.
Ende ibag yari wogub qumoramirei. Qumoramari munon ombur eng wuri nob qamamir: “An meimet qamb munon igomot der bogomar e gub qamb munon teteret e asi qib igoumon?
Wo e me igo, der bogomai. Qoan Galili ite igo aninob qamar eng misir igar.
Wo ete qamarei: “Munangit wau munon boru wurit duimari ba nam tenori big waramari umiba. Uma ba tumunimunorei igama qem ombur gari ubura bo der bugemba.”
Ende qamarari yamangar eng qob eng misir igub wogub bo igeser tumun wogub isub mi eng gabriamir eng Yisas wonou imbigau yurau 11-ende igour eng wurinob qamb ne munon ar qei gor wurinob qamarari igumirei.
<range>
Yamangar eng isub qamamir eng Maria Makdala ne Yoana ne Maria ger Yems unor eng ne yamangar qei wurinob igo qob eng Yisas wonou yurau eng wurinob qamamirei.
Qamarari Yisas yurau eng der yamangar eng ar wob mugenderi igub qamb qib igour qamb qob me igatarau.
Ende abari Pita der uyab-uyab munon teteret ite bo irarei. Irab inumor tumun erobon asi mingoan qas garei, mi ger me geau. Ende gab bo igeser isub misir qebebi igub igoai.
Qen end gari Yisas yurau eng ombur der munai ginam Emeus eng isub qamb tap toat isub igurei. Ginam eng ginam aib Yerusalem wogub isau eng pi.
Ombur isub igo mi eng gagar ebeter end qamb isub igurei.
Ende qamb isub igamari Yisas wonou yar wobon end naget wurinob isub igoai.
Isub igama gamir eng wuri mi mag opuramau gas ende aba Yisas wo sir me imbigau.
Ne Yisas der wurinob qamar: “An ombur meimet qamb qobub isub igoumon?” Ende qamara ombur mi toubet qi naget igurei.
Ende at igo ne ger unum Kliopas der qebi qamar: “Munon irou Yerusalem igour eng mi barim urigom ebeter eng gugum qoyam. Ne gari qoyam ue igo qamb qib igoan?”
Ende qamara Yisas qebi qamar: “Mi maigas abai?” Ne wo bo qamar: “Nasaret munon Yisas tumuniamir eng abar end qamb igoun. Wo Qenu wonou qob gigit qamarau munon. Wo Qenu sarau qeretut nob baab ne qob qeretut nob munon yamangar wuri nob qamb qib igoai.
Ende at qib igama ininou munon barai tari Qenut mian yab igour eng ne qomon qoat igour eng wuri der gabmant duiamirei. Duimari wuri qob qamb nausi ne uminer qamb nam tenori big waramari umorei.
Eng wo Isrel munon wuriubersierib qamb dererei ende qamb misir iguminei. Ne mi eng gagar abar eng qen ombur gari uburerei.
Ne gor ininou yamangar qei itumut inqeisiau gas ende uburei.
Wuri munon teteret irab tumun erobon isub gaur eng wo git goan igama me geau. Ende gab abari enger der wuri nob qurar eng, igomot der bogomai qurar eng gugum qamarari igunei.
Igub ininou munon bo mi eng gub qamb irab gaur eng yamangar ininob quraur gas ende, Yisas git goan me geau.”
Ende qamarari Yisas wurinob qamar: “An qoan Qenu qob gigit qamara munon gumatemir eng misir ue igo oau segagam me buroumon?
Munon wuriubersiau tari eng wo umb wogub bo igomot der bugama Qenu wonou aba baraitari igoriba.”
Ende qamb ne qoan qanambig Moses qob gumater end qanambig qob suab bisii Qenu qamara munon gumatemir end bis beneriamorei.
Ne wuri isi munai ginam isub qamb isumir eng pisiari ne Yisas wo wuriwogub tumbigi isib qamb ater ego wuri duet qamamir: “Worom mom isar eng ai itumoramba. In nob et iniban.” Ende qamarari wurinob mor isorei.
<range>
Isub nam qabt erogori bugab mani parau ba Qenut qamb nonogursi boat wuriserei.
Qen end Yisas mom gab imbig ebetemir ego wuri magqurt umanger qi qorei.
Qoa me gab wurinou qob-qob qamamir: “Qataben yar igo qob eng ininob qamara igoun eng igub in oau mom ipirai.” ende qamamirei.
Ende me gab wogub bo qand yonam Yerusalem qite wonou imbigau yurau 11-ende igour end irab ibagamir eng banamori qei wurinob qiumuni igurei.
Ende ibegeari der ombur wurinob qamamir: “Munon Barai segagam igomot der bugab qib igama Saimon garei.”
Ende qamarari ombur wuri gor der qataben isub igo qob wuri nob qamb isub igoar eng ne, mor isub mani parau boat wurisa qen end gab imbigari iuar eng gugum qamamirei.
Qob eng ende suab igamari Yisas wonou diab wuri wobon et igo wurinob qamar: “Oau mein burab igoarar.”
Ende qamara wuri mai moui qiyo aibigau qamb borusi yariamirei.
Ende abari wurinob qamar: “An meimet qamb qiet misir qebebi igub igoumon?
An ye uben qamb nebit qamb gaiar. Ye yonou gari. An yebaab gaiar, moui mai min qer nob ende igo?”
Ende qamb ne uben goten nob wurisirbigorei.
Ende aba wuri mismisiramir ego sig oau apand me burau. Ende at igamari wurinob qamar: “An mi niau ger et igo?”
Ende qamara yag wai qibi ger utemirei.
Utari boroumi wuri magqurt norei.
Ende at ne wurinob qamar: “Qoan aninob qib igo ne qob aninob qamam eng see mom gaumon eng. Qoan ir Moses qomon yet qamb gumater eng ne Qenu qob qamara gumatemir eng ne Sam qob yet qamb gumatemir eng gugum irimani ubura gaumon eng.
Yisas ende qamb ne wo wurisiara misir uber igub qob qoan gumatemir eng mom musub imbigumirei.
Ende abari wurinob qamar: “Qob ete qamb gumatemir eng: Munon wurimusiau tari eng wo git goan uter weriba. Ende ebet wo uma tumunimunorei igama qen ombur gari ubura bo iigomot der bugemba.
Ende aba qanambig Yerusalem end wo unumot qamb qiroari munon ai qent gugum wot oabig ne wurinou qomon boru mogirt warari Qenu wuriubersia wonou yurau igorubour.
An ye yegaman end gigit qob suouboumon.
Ende abari Tain qoan anit mi iyeter eng ye anit imurimbam. End ne an mom ginam aib end mom qoat igamari mi eng anit der an nonogursieriba.”
Ende qamb ne ginam aib eng wogub oromar isi Betani end isumirei. Isub uben bemeni wuri nonogursiarei.
Ende wuri nonogursi wogub iser Qenu mot erer irarei.
Iroa wogub uru wab wot mismisir bo yonam Yerusalem yaremirei.
Yar end igo qenen inorou munai aib end isub Qenut igub igurei.
Qoan ir qob igoai. Qob eng Qenu nob igoai. Qob eng wo gor Qenu gas ende.
Qoan ir Qenu mi ger me barsiau qen end qob eng Qenu nob igoai.
Qobt Qenu mi gugum barsiarei. Mi gugum ai qorut me derau.
Igom igamau eng wot igoai. Igom eng begent munon wurit isorei.
Begen eng itum omboarir igo, ne itum wo begen eng me muasereminerei.
Qenu qob biga munon ger gim isub bo qen eng yariner end munon yamangar wurinob qem qamb imuriamor eng unum Yon. Ende imurimine isub munon wuri nob qamara igub begen end oabigar qamb.
<range>
Yon, wo begen eng ue. Wo ar begen eng deriner end qob suab wuri imbig qib igoai.
Begen eng apand begent munon gugum wurit arir igo, eng ag e dara.
Qob eng ag e der igoai. Igama Qenu ai wot barsier eng munon gugum wuri wo qoyam ue.
Wo wonou ginam qenen isuor eng wonou yurau magqurt gab wugumirei.
Ende abari munon qei wot oabig ba moriamir eng Qenu wonou wagrari buror qamb wurimaribigorei.
Wuri Qenu yonou wau wurit qurar eng ur unor tumbigi end ue, ne wurinou qenungau end gor ue. Qenu wonou gari wurinonogursi igo end wonou wau tetemi.
Qob eng munangit warub inamar igoai. In wonou oau mein eng wonou wes ar eng wot igama gaminei. Wonomi wes ar eng Tain wonou wau gari qas imurima derer end oau mein ne qomon apand eng wot yab di igoai.
Ne Yon wot qamb qamar: “Ye munon end wot qamb ete qamam eng: ‘wo qanamt yariner eng ye sarau oboum eng yetanamimba eng wo ye ue igimine wo igoar eng.’ “
In wonomi uber eng init yab di qoa ne wo in gugum inubersi igo. Eng Qenu qoan qomon init bigor eng Moses imbiga gumaterei. A oau qiutab ne qomon apand eng munon inubersiau tari Yisas eng ba darab inimbigorei.
<range>
Munon ger Qenu bais me geau. Wonou wau gari qas, wo qenen ur nob igo end wo ag e darab in Qenu inimbigorei.
Qanam end Yon munon wurimaragansi ya obotar ende at qib igama ne Yuda munon baraitari ginam aib Yerusalem igour eng wuri der Qenut mian iset big igour munon qei ne Libai yurau qei (Libai wurinou sarau eng munon inorou munai aib eng qoat igour eng wurit sarau baab igour) wuriimurimari Yont yar qamamir: “Ne your?”
Ende qamarari Yon me wabimau, dibes wuri nob qamar: “Ye munon an ubersiau tari eng ue.”
Ende qamara wuri qebi qamamir: “End ne ne your? Ne mai Elaiya qiyo?” Qamarari wo qamar: “Ye eng ue.” Qamara wuri qamamir: “Ende gab eng ne mai munon Qenu qob gigit qamarau munon eng ne?” End qamarari wo qamar: “Eng gor ue,” qamar.
Qamara wuri qamamir: “Ende gab eng dibes ininob qem. Qamara in musub mom niimbig wogub irab munon inimuriamir eng wuri nob qumurune igubour.”
Ende qamarari Yon qamar: Ye munon ger seger ait igo ab igoar eng ye. Munon Baraitari der isiba, ai tap ingong-ingong eng ne ai qauren-qauren eng wot musitat. Qoan Qenu wonou qob gigit qamarau munon Aisaia qamb gumater gas ende.
Ende qamara wogub ne munon qei Parisi yurau wuriimurimari yaremir eng bo der Yon nob qamamir: “Ende gab eng ne, mai munon inubersiau tari eng qiyo, a Elaiya qiyo, a Qenu qob gigit qamarau munon eng qiyo, ne eng ue gab eng ne meimet qamb munon ya obotar wurimaragansi qib igoan?”
<range>
Ende qamarari Yon taui qamar: “Ye ar ya asint wurimaragansi qib igoum; a munon ger dererei aninob igama an wo me imbigoumon eng.
Wo ye qanam yar igo, eng ye wonou goten yau eng maigas me nerimitinei, ye qob qinan,” ende qamarei.
Mi eng ebetemir eng ya Yordan wes end munai ginam Betani end. Ginam end Yon munon yat wurimaragansi igoai.
Barim ende der Yisas Yont isub igama gab qamar: “Gaiar, Qenu wonou sipsip wan yeim yar igo ite. Wo munon gugum ai qent e qomon borut igour eng wab ariramatariba.
Munon end ye wot qamb igoum eng. Ete qamam eng: munon ger ye qanamt yariner eng wo yetanamimba. Ye ue igimine wo qoan ir igoai.
Ye wo sir ue, ego ye munon ende yat wurimaragansi ne munon eng Isrel munon wuriimbigine gaiar qamb.”
Ende qamb qamar: “Ye Qenu wonou Igomurur qau gam eng morogan gas ende Qenu ginam end igo der wo tarit end igoai.
Qen end gor ye wo me imbigau. Ende ebet igimine Qenu munon yat wurimaragansi qamb yiimuriamor eng yiimbig qamar: ‘Munon ger yat maragansi igama Igomurur qau der wot igama gab eng qem, qo, munon e munon ya Igomurur qau ten wuri maragansieriba.’ “
Qamb qamar: “End ne ye qo gab wogub wot Qenu wonou wau ten ende aninob qamam eng,” ende qamarei.
Ne barim ende der Yon wonou imbigau munon ombur wuri nob end igoai.
Ende igamari Yisas wurit isub igoai. Isub igama gab qamar: “Gaiar, Qenu wonou sipsip wan yeim yar igo qita.”
Ende qamara munon ombur eng igub Yon wogub Yisas nob isumirei.
Ende toat isub igamari igeser ibag wuri qebi qamar: “An meimi gub qamb asi qib igoumon?” Ende qamara ombur qamamir: “Barai, ne eret igoan?”
Qamarari wo qamar: “Yarab gaiar.” Ende qamara wo nob isub munai igoar eng gab nob end igurei. Qen end worom nerimb pisier end.
Munon ombur eng Yon qamara igub Yisas nob isumir eng ger unum Andru wo Saimon Pita wonou umour.
Qen end qas Andru umom Saimon gab nob qamar: “In munon inubersiau tari eng gunei.”
Ende qamb Saimon mot Yisast isorei. Isa Yisas Saimon gab qamar: “Ne Saimon, Yon wonou wau. Ne unum bo Sipas ende bigoum.” (Unum Sipas eng Yuda wurinou qob, Grik qobt Pita, unum ombur qanam eng nomon).
Ne bo barim ende der Yisas ai Galili isib at igo munon ger unum Pilip gab nob qamar: “Yara ye nob qib igorun.”
Pilip wonou ginam qenen eng Betsaida. Andru Pita nob wurinou ginam erogori.
Pilip bo isub Nataniel gab qamar: “In munon qoan deriba qamarari Moses qoan qomon qob qamb gumater eng. Ne gor Qenu qob gigit qamarau munon wot qamb gumatemir eng gaun. Wo Nasaret munon Yosep eng wonou wau.”
Ende qamara Nataniel qamar: “Mai, meimi uber ger Nasaret end dieriba?” Ende qamara Pilip qamar: “Ende yar ge?” qamar.
Nataniel Yisast yara gab wot qamar: “Gaiar, munon e Isrel munon apand, qob qetopur qamarau eng wot me igo.”
Ende qamara Nataniel qebi qamar: “Ne maigas yiimbigan?” Ende qamara Yisas taui qamar: “Pilip net me arau igama nam qanamt end bugab igama negumei.”
Ne Nataniel taui qamar: “Ne apand Qenu wau, ne gor ne Isrel wurinou baraitari gari.”
Ende qamara Yisas qamar: “Eng ar ye nam qaragas erobon end naget igama negumei qemerine yet oabig quran. End ne qen geret mi sig aib ne se e gan eng wotanami giban.”
Ende nob qamb wogub gugum wuri nob qamar: “Segagam aninob quraum, qen geret Qenu ginam end asi gunon eng miroau gas ende aba Qenu enger eng Munangit wau end darab ir darab ir ende at igamari ibogouboumon,” ende qamarei.
Qen ombur ubura ne ai Galili ginam Kana end munon ger yamangar nob qi baub qamb etemirei. Qen end Yisas unor end igoai.
End ne Yisas wonou imbigau yurau eng nob isar qamb gim ibegeari isumirei.
Qen end mi aib at nub wain ya gor nub igamari uburerei. Ende gab Yisas unor der nob qamar: “Wain ya mom nub ugaur.”
Ende qamara Yisas taui qamar: “Ye meimi ebeibine ye nob quran? Ye qen se.”
Ende nob qamara unor wogub sarau eng baab igour eng wuri nob qamar: “An et igorunon eng mi ger abar qamb anit qamara gab eng qob toat mi qurar eng abar,” qamar.
Qen end Yuda wurinou qomon eng toat ya unab ba di big igo mor isub qamb goten uben birogoni isub igour eng. Egi aib-aib 6-ende igoai. Egi end ya garan aib degen-degent unab igoun gas end igoai.
End ne Yisas sarau munon eng wuri nob qamara: “Egi end ya unar,” ende qamara unari dieramorei.
Dierama ba diarari wuri nob qamar: “Ya qei waari bis munon mani qoat igo eng utar.” Ende qamara waari bis utemirei.
Bisub utari warigesi nub gar eng qer uber, wain ya warorei. Ende gab wain ya eng eret baumirei qi eng wo sir ue. Munon ya asin waari bis utemir eng wuri sir. Ende gab munon yamangar se bauor eng wot ara yara,
nob qamar: “Munon gugum mi aib at nub eng wain ya qer uber ete eng gigit qerei wurisari nub ugeari ne qer ii ete eng bo qanamt qerei igour. Ne bo uber eng duet igo see qas imurima yara,” ende qamarei.
Yisas qen qamart wonomi wes eng ebeter eng. Eng ginam Kana ai Galili end. Ende aba wonou imbigau yurau eng gab wot oabigumirei.
Qen eng ubura ne Yisas unor ne umuragrari ne wonou wuri imbigau yurau eng ende oromar Kaperneam end isub qen gurum nami end igurei.
End igamari Yuda wurinou qen aib Qenu wonou ensel tonoanb me igaramau qamb mi aib at nub igour eng piara gab Yisas Yerusalem qite irarei.
Irab inorou munai aib mor isub gar eng munon irou bur qarig ne sipsip morogan ne eng nomon qur eng gagar bisub nor end mi taui baub igamari ibagarei.
Ende ibag ne bunom tau ger ba qungausi ne munon mor igour eng orotoar arir, ne bur qarig sipsip qamb eng gugum orotoar arir, ne wurinou nomon qur nam qabt bigumir eng ten biigiamorei.
Ende at ne munon morogan taui ba igour eng wuri nob qamar: “An mi e ba iuar, Tain munai bo ba sumungasi mind munai gas ende me abar.”
Ende aba wonou imbigau yurau eng der qob qoan gumatemir ete igoar end misir igumirei: “Ye nonou munai sig mom qenungoum. Munon ger munai eng sumungasia gab ye oau biriberi nibam,” ende igoai.
Ne Yuda munon baraitari bo igeser yar qebi qamamir: “Ne qomon wes ger aba gab in qomorun, qo munon eng Qenu boopurima igo end abar eng, ende qomoruboun.”
Ende qamarari Yisas taui qamar: “Qenu munai e bapamimari ne ye bo qen ombur garit mindaibam.”
Ende qamara wuri qamamir: “Ii, munai e bapamimari qen ombur garit mindaibam quran? Munon munai e mindat igamari togun 46-ende wara boopuramirei,” ende qamamirei.
Eng Yisas Qenu munait qamar eng wonou git goan end qamb igoai.
End ne wo uma tumunimari bo igomot der bogoma ne wonou imbigau yurau eng misir igub qamamir: “Qo, qob qoan igoar eng mi git abar eng.” Ende qamb wot oa bigumirei.
Yuda wurinou mi niau qen (Pasova qamb igour) eng gab Yisas Yerusalem end ir igo mi wes-wes aba dibenara gab munon irou wot oabigumirei.
Ende abari Yisas wo munon gugum wurinou misir mom imbig wogub wonomi ba me dibesiau.
Munon ger igo ger wonou qomon eng Yisas imbig me nob qamarau. Yisas wonou, munon gugum misir eng imbig igoai.
Qen end munon ger igoai unum eng Nikodemus. Wo Yuda wurinou baraitari, wo git Parisi wurinou yurau.
Qen geret wo itum Yisast diab nob qamar: “Imbigau munon, in ne mom niimbigoun Qenu niimurima derenei. Munon ar ger Qenu wo me maribiginer eng qomon wes-wes ne ebet igoan eng maigas me ebeinerei.”
Ende qamara Yisas taui nob qamar: “Sig apand nonob quraum, munon ger wau qomourt gas ende me ebeiner eng Qenu wonou bibis eng me ginerei.”
Ne Nikodemus qamar: “Munon mom isigi burab wogub bo sabar wau qomourt buriba? Mai, bo unor qur erobon isa bo sabar baiba qiyo?”
Ende qamara Yisas qamar: “Apand quraum, munon ger ya asin Igomurur qau ten obotet maragansiari bo munon bubun gas me ebeiner eng, Qenu wonou bibis end me isinerei.
End ne tain nanib anbaub igour eng aninou munangit qomon end, a Qenu Igomurur qau ansiara dariamunon eng Igomurur qau wonou.
Ye qob eng at aninob qemerine an me qiar. Wogub bo nani se anbaiau gas ende burar.
Moon umo di ite ir qiyo ite yar umo isub ende aba in toau qas igub igoun, git eng eret isub igo eng in sir ue. Eng gas ende munon Igomurur qau wurisera bo munon bubun gas ende burunor eng ende gas gari.”
Ende qamara Nikodemus qamar: “Eng maigas ende ebeiba?”
Qamara Yisas taui qamar: “Ne Isrel wurinou munon baraitari igo qomon wuriimbig igoan eng meimet qamb mi eng qangangetaran?
Segagam nonob quraun, in mi magqurt gab imbig aninob quraun. Eng an bo bur iruges big qenen qob aninob qumurune mogirt wab wogub igoumon.
Ne ye mi ag e nonou gab mom imbig igoan end mit big quraum eng ne me imbigan. Eng bo Qenu ginamt end bo qemerine ne maigas imbigiban?
Munon ger Qenu ginamt end irab mi gab wogub me darau. Munangit wau wonou gari Qenu ginam eng wogub dererei.”
Qamb qamar: “Qoan seger ait Moses mani qugur barsi qorent uriamor gas ende bo Munangit wau ende siorubour.
Ende siarari munon gugum wot oabig eng gugum bebereg igorubour.
Qenu munon gugum ai qent e sig-sig mom wuriqenungar ne wonou wau ten eng imurima dererei. End ne munon gugum wot oabig eng me umunorei, qenen bebereg igorubour.
Qenu wo wau imuriamor eng munon wuriqerei quguragsi qamb me imurimau. Wo munon wurimusub wuriqubeiom qamb.
Munon ger wot oabiginer eng wot qob musiteib qamb me ebeinerei. A, munon wot me oabiginer eng wo qo boruburerei igo. Eng wo Qenu wau gari qas wot me oabigau end.
Uyor sarau beau qanam eng ete: begen qo ag e der begentar ego munon yamangar wurinou qomon boru-boru eng ebet begen eng wogub itum igorub at igour.
Eng munon qei qomon boru ebet igour eng begen end yari igour.
A munon qei qomon apand ebet igour eng wuri begen end igorub qamb qenunget igour. Wuri sarau obounor eng Qenu wurisiara abari munon gugum diban gubour.
Ende qamb wogub ne Yisas wonou imbigau yurau eng oromar ai Yudia wes end isumirei. Isub qen qei end igo munon wurimaragansi ya obotar igoai.
Yon wo gor munon wurimaragansi ya obotar igoai. Wo ginam Ainon Salim nob qani end igama munon yamangar wot isari wurimaragansi igoai. Ginam end ya aib igoar end.
Qen end Herot Yon uyort me bigau igama.
Ne Yon wonou imbigau yurau eng der Yuda munon ger ya ubau qomon end at wogub nob agunumirei.
Ende at wogub Yont isub nob qamamir: “Barai, ne qoan ya Yordan ig iro igo munon ger net isa ya ubetet wot dibes qamara igumin eng, wo gor munon wurimaragansi ya obotar igo. Igama munon gugum wot isub qob qamara igub igour.”
Ende qamarari Yon taui qamar: “Qenu munon ger mi me imbiginer eng wonou maigas mi ger me ebeinerei.
Qob qoan aninob qamam eng an mom qoyam. End qoan aninob ete qemerine igumon eng, ‘Ye munon anmusiau tari eng ue, ye wonou qob gim big yiimurima gigit yoroum’ qamam eng.
Munon ger yamangar bainer eng yamangar eng munon eng wonou qoregen. Munon yamangar bainer eng wonou munon banam eng yar qani naget igo wonou banam yamangar bainer eng qob qamara toau isa igub mismisir igoriba. Eng gas ende ye gor ende mismisir igoum.
End ne wo unum diban igama ne ye ii igoriner eng uber.”
Ende qamb qamar: “Munon erer qite derer eng wo mi gugum imbig igo. Ne munon ai qent et dari eng wo mi ag et gari qob suab igo. Munon Qenu ginamt igo deriner eng, mi erer qite ne mi ag e gugum imbig igo, wo munon gugum wuritanamima.
Wo mi gab ne igub igo end wuri nob qamb igo ego munon wo qob me igotoun qamb at igour.
Munon ger wonou qob igetet eng Qenu apand qurar eng munon qei wuriimbigiba.
Munon eng Qenu imurima derer eng wonou Igomurur qau qeretutnob opur igama wonou qob eng gor qeretutnob qamb qib igo.
Wonou ur eng borusi mom qenunget ne mi gugum wonou ubent big nonogursiarei.
Munon qei wau end wot oabig eng igomot igorubour. A munon wo qob qamara bagau wagir qib igorunor eng umubour. Qenu wurit misiringeteriner eng ten ende igoriba.
Qen end Parisi igumir eng “Yisas wo munon yurau irou wot isari ya obotar wurimaragansi ne Yon wotanami igo,” ende qamarari igumirei.
Qen end Yisas wo git munon me wurimaragansiau. Wonou imbigau yurau eng apand wurimaragansi igurei.
Qob eng mom aib bura Parisi igub ugaur qamb Yisas igeser bo Galili irarei.
Wo tap eng toat Samaria wurinou ai isib qamb ir igoai.
Irab iri Samaria wurinou ginam aib ger unum Sikar end weib irarei. Ginam eng qoan Yekop ai ger wonou wau Yosep uter eng qani end igoai.
Ne gor Yekop ya tumun goaneter eng ginam end igoai. Igama ne Yisas ir igama worom ginam tog yara wogub git goan quguraget wogub is ya tumun qani end bugab igoai.
Ende igama Samaria yamangar ger ya unib qamb yarerei. Yara Yisas nob qamar: “Yat oboum, unab yesa nib.”
Qen end wonou imbigau yurau eng mani taui baub qamb ginam aib ite iramirei.
Ende qamara yamangar eng taui qamar: “Ne Yuda munon ne ye Samaria yamangar meimet qamb ya unab neteibine quran?” Qanam eng Yuda Samaria nob me qibanamsi igour end.
Ende qamara Yisas taui qamar: “Ende gab eng Qenu mi ar natab ig eng imbig ne munon e ‘ya yesa nini’ qurar eng ya unab utiner eng ne bo yat at qemerinen eng wo ya nub bebereg igamau eng neteiba.”
Ende qamara yamangar taui qamar: “Barai, ya e sig tumun qumqumo, ne gor ne yangaran ue. Eng ya nub igomot igamau eng eret igama uniban?
Ininou tonoan namungur Yekop wonou ya tumun e. Qoan wonou wagrari big a bur qarig ne sipsip ende nub igour eng init wagerei. End ne ne mai Yekop aib igoar eng ne wotanamiman qiyo?”
Ende qamara Yisas taui qamar: “Munon gugum ya e nub eng yat bo ebet sabar-sabar nub igorubour.
A ye ya neteib qamb quraum eng munon ger utine niner eng bo sabar oau saragairoa yat me ebeinerei. Ya tumun e wonou qenen igo qas ende igama igoriba. Igo ne ya eng qenen aba iigomot igoriba.”
Ende qamara yamangar taui qamar: “Barai, ye ya qenen yat yar ebet ya tumun qumo e ego arir unab ubumot iyetroum, ya ne quran eng qand yesa nub bo sabar yat me qirinei.”
Ende qamara Yisas taui nob qamar: “Ne qand irab namamit ab nob yarar.”
Qamara yamangar bo qamar: “Ye munon ger ue.” Ne Yisas taui qamar: “Ye see nonob qemerine, ‘ye munon ue’ quran eng git segagam.
Ego, ye negaum eng ne qoan munon uben ig ue ende baunei. Ne ne munon see nob igoan eng nonou munon apand ue.”
Ne yamangar qamar: “Barai, segagam ne niimbigoum, ne munon mi qen geret diorunor eng imbigau tari. End ne ye mi ger qemerine ne qamara igub.
Ininou tonoanb ai qaur et qiumuni Qenut qenen igub mismisir igurei. Ne see an Yuda munon, bo Qenut igub qamb eng bo qenen ginam aib Yerusalem qite ir igoarar quraumon.”
Ne Yisas yamangar nob qamar: “Ne ye qob quraum eng iruges big igu, qen ger igeserma gab eng an ai qaur et qiyo Yerusalem end sir qiumuni Tain aib wot me igub igurunanei.
End ne an Samaria, munon an yourt oabig qiumuni wot igub at igoumon qi eng an sir me imbigoumon. In Yuda at igoun eng in sir imbigoun. Qanam eng Qenu munon gugum wuriubersierib qamb werei ebeter eng in Yuda yurau erobon end.
Qen ger yarib eng see qo yarar eng. End ne munon Taint apand wot oabig Igomurur qau ten simot orunor eng, munon yurau eng Tain wuriqenungariba.
Qenu wo munangit gas ende ue. End munon Wot mismisirub qamb qomon apand end wurinou igomurur ten wot mismisirunor.”
Yisas ende qamara yamangar eng der qamar: “Eng ye qoyam, ‘munon wuriubersiau tari eng unum Krais qamb igour eng darab mi gugum dibes ininob qamb ugeiba,’ ende qamarari igub igumei.”
Yisas taui qamar: “Munon eng qamarari igub igoan eng Ye gari, see nonob qobub igoum eng.”
Ende qamb waga wonou imbigau yurau mani baub iramir eng yaremirei. Yarab Yisas yamangar eng nob qobub igama gab borusi qietemirei. Qiet ne ger der yamangar end ne “meim baib e yaranei?” Qo, ger der Yisas nob “meimet qamb yamangar e nob qobub igoan?” Ende ger Yisas yamangar eng wuri nob me qamarau.
Ne yamangar eng yangaran end wogub bo igeser ginamt irab munon gugum wuri nob qamarei.
Qamar: “Qand isub munon ger ye qomon qi ebet qib igoum eng dibes ye nob qamb ugai. Munon wuriubersiau tari deriba qamb igour eng wo gari.”
Ende qamara munon gugum Yisas gub qamb ginam wogub isumirei.
Qen end Yisas wonou yurau mani bisub Yisas utab qamamir: “Barai, ne mi ger nub ge.”
Ne Yisas wuri nob qamar: “Ye mani qei igo, mani eng an qoyam ue eng.”
Ende qamara imbigau munon yurau eng der wurinou-wurinou qi qebi qamamir: “Munon qei mi ba yar uturei igama qura nee?”
Ende qamb igamari Yisas der qamar: “Ye mani eng munon ye sarau eb qamb yiimurima derem eng wonou sarau eng ye ebet ugeibam.
An ete qamb igoumon: Inaun 4-ende uma mani arirau qen yariba, qamb igoumon eng. Ye qemerine igar: Mani qo arit igo eng an musub me gaumon, gonau qen eng qo yar igo.
Munon mani gonau eng qo goanet git ba qenen bebereg igamau end big igo. End ne munon mani ubau eng nob mani goanet igo eng nob ombur mismisir igour.
Qob eng apand, munon ger mani uba arira ger gonat igo.
End ne ye animurimine mani eng arit igo eng qoan an me goanet geau, eng qaum is gonauboumon. Git eng munon qei wurinou mani ubumirei igama arira goanet igour eng an ar isub wuri nob goanar,” ende qamarei.
Samaria munon ginam aib eng, yamangar eng isub wonou qomon qi at qib igoar eng Yisas dibes nob qamb ugea is qamara igub Yisast oabigumirei.
Ne wuri Yisast yarab wuri nob igoar qamb duet qamarari qen ombur wuri nob igurei.
End igo wonou bo qob qamara igub irou wot oabigumirei.
Ende at ne yamangar eng nob qamamir: “Ne gari qob eng qamara igub wot oa me bigoun. Wonou gor qanam mom musub qamara igub wot oabigoun. Segagam munon eng gari munon ai qent gugum inubersieriba qamb igour eng,” ende qamamirei.
Yisas qen ombur ende wuri nob igoi wogub bo Galili irarei.
Irib qamb wonomit qamar: “Qob gigit qamarau munon ger wonou ginam qenen end unum nob me igo.”
Ende qamb wogub ir Galili weib iroa munon eng wo gab mismisiramirei. Qanam eng qen aib ‘Pasova’ qamb mi bingen nub igour qen end wurinou Yerusalem qite irab Yisas mi gugum aba gamir end.
Yisas ginam eng wogub bo sabar ai Galili ginam ger Kana end isorei. Qoan ya asin aba wain ya burer ginam end isorei. Isa ne ginam ger Kaperneam end gabman baraitari wonou sarau munon ger igoar eng wonou munonbor wau ger toar wab igoai.
Qen end igor eng: ‘Yisas ai Yudia wogub Galili end yara’ ende qamarari igorei. Igub isub Yisas nob qemerine isub wonou wau eng musi qamb. Wau eng toar wara umib pisi igoai.
Is qebi qamara Yisas nob qamar: “An qomon sig maieng wes-wes me gab qi eng yet me oabigunanei.
Qamara munon eng taui qamar: “Barai, igama yonou wau umiba, qand nob isun.”
Qamara Yisas bo nob qamar: “Ne is, nonou wau uber buriba.” Ende qamara munon eng qob end oabig isorei.
Qataben isa-isa wonou sarau munon qei diab gab qamamir: “Nonou wau uberet igo.”
Ende qamarari wuri qebi qen mait wonou wau uberetar eng qamara wuri qamamir: “Barim worom wo bures ig biga nonou wau toar wagerei.”
Ende qamarari wau ur barim qen endet Yisas nob qamar: “Nonou wau uber buriba.” Qamar end misir igub ginamt isub wonou wagrari big wot oabig igurei.
Yisas Yudia wogub Galili irab sarau wes eng ebeter eng qen omburt. Qen qamart ya asin aba wain ya warurei, ne bo wau toar qamara qas wager eng.
Qen end Yuda wurinou qen aib qamb mi bingen nub igour eng yara gab Yisas Yerusalem qite irarei.
Yerusalem youn aib nomont bigumir eng tend ger wai sipsip wurinou tend qamb igour. Wai sipsip tend qani end ya tai ger igoai. Hibru qobt ‘Betesda’ qamb igour. Ya tai gabut end munai ar bugab igamau 5-ende igoai.
Munai end toar munon irou igurei. Qei mag tuum, qei goten boru ne qei qer gugum gurumot uburer eng end igurei. (Wuri end igo ya tai eng qorogot dera gun qamb qenen qoat igurei.
Qen qei Qenu munon enger der ya weib isa ya qorogot deara gab munon ger wonou gigit isub ya weib isiner eng toar waga iua igurei).
Qen end munon ger toar wara togun 38-ende igoai.
Igama qen end Yisas is gab mom imbigorei, munon eng unor set baia toar warei. Ende gab nob qamar: “Ne uberburib qenungan qiyo?”
Ne toar munon eng Yisas nob qamar: “Io, qenen ya qoroga ye is weib isub uber burin qamb ebet igoum ego munon qei bais uber-uber eng qand yetanami isub ubet uberet iua igour. Ye munon ger ye ba gigit isa uber-uber burin eng munon ger ue. End ar e inab igoum e.”
Ne Yisas nob qamar: “Der naget nonou qug oramet inab igoan eng ba is.”
Ende qamara munon eng uberet put der naget qug inab igoar eng menub ba isorei. Qen eng ebeter eng inorou qent.
Munon eng uberet qib igama Yuda der gab qamamir: “See inorou qen in gitab igoun eng ne meimet qamb inorou songi qug bemenumi ba qib igoan?”
Ne munon eng der qamar: “Munon ye yemusiar eng, ‘qug ba is’ ende yet qamara ye ba qib igoum.”
Ende qamara wuri qebi qamamir: “Munon eng your ende qamara at qib igoan?” ende qamamirei.
Qen end munon yurau irou end Yisas munon eng ende musub wogub wuri qob ar qoa wogub munon eng Yisas sir gab Yuda me wuri imbigau.
Ai gab-gab end munon uberetar eng inorou munai end qib igama Yisas qib gab nob qamar: “See ne mom uber buran, bo qomon boru ger me eb. Bo ebeinen eng qoan quguraget igoan eng wotanami bo sig-sig mom qugurageteriban.”
Ende qamara munon eng Yisas mom imbig wogub isub Yuda wuri nob qamarei.
Qen end inorou qent Yisas munon eng musuor qanam end ne Yuda qanambig qarausiamirei.
Ende abari Yisas wuri nob qamar: “Yonou Tain qenen sarau baab igo end ye gor sarau baaum,” ende qamarei.
Yisas Qenut ‘yonou Tain’ end ye gor Qenu qamar end Yuda munon wuri imusi borusi misiringet Yisas mom waramb qas wogub at igurei. (Qanam eng Yisas wo Qenu wau ue wo munon ar wau qamb igour end at igurei.)
Ende abari Yisas wuri nob qamar: “Segagam aninob quraum, wau wonou misirt mi ger me ebet igo, ur mi aba gab parangaub ebet igo.
Ur wau sig qenunget ne mi gugum wonou ebet igo eng wau imbig igo. Isi yarab mi eng mom imbig ugea ne bo sarau aib-aib eng imbiga ebet mi eng gagar ebeiner eng wotanamimba. Ende aba gab an misir qebebi iguboumon.
Tain munon umari bo wurimenima igomot der bugab igour. Eng gas ende wonou wau gor munon ger wonou igomot igorib qenunga eng wau gor munon eng menima igomot igoriba.
Ur munon me wuri qereiminerei. Munon qereimau qomon eng waut wagerei.
End ne ur wot igub qenunget gab eng wau gor ende gas ende gari. Munon ger wau me qenunget gab eng ur gor wonou wau imurima derer eng me qenunginerei.”
Ende qamb qamar: “Segagam aninob quraum, munon ger ye qob e quraum eng iruges big igub your yiimurima derem qi eng wot oabiginer eng igom qenen igoriba. Qenu munon eng bo qerei me quguragsierinerei. Wo qo umb wogub bebereg igo.
Eng segagam aninob quraum. Qen eng qo yarerei igo. Munon umburiamir eng Qenu wau ara qob toau igotounor eng wuri igom igorubour.
Qenen bebereg igamau eng ur wonou qanam end ne wonou wau gor bebereg igamau eng qanam.
Wo munangit wau end ne munon qomon qereimau qomon eng wot wagerei.
End ne an mi eng bubun gaun qamb me qiar. Qen ger gab munon umburiamir tumunt igour eng wurit ara toau igub tumun wogub der bugombour. Bugab munon qomon uber ebet igoriner eng igom igoriba. A qomon boru ebet igorunor eng Qenu wuri qerei ne wurisogar ginam boru end wuriimurima isubour.”
<range>
Ende qamb qamar: “Ye mi eng gar ebeteri igoum eng yonou misirt mi ger me ebet igoum. Tain wonou munon qomon wurit qereiom ende yet qamara ebet igoum, ebine qoregen isub igo. ‘Yonou wariges mi ger ebeini’ ende qamb me ebet igoum, wonou yiimurima derem eng gari qob igetet ebet igoum.
Ye gari yonomit dibes qemerin eng an apand qamb me igesounanei.
A munon ger ye yegab imbig ne yet dibes qamb igo eng apand.
Qoan aninou munon qei Yont imurimari isub wo qob qamara igub diab aninob qamarari iguman eng wo qob apand qas qamarei.
Ye eng quraum eng munangit yet dibes qamarar qamb me quraum. Ye quraum eng an igomot qenen bebereg igamau werei eng qamb igoum.
Yon wo urut begen gas ende begent munon wurit ariramorei. Ende aba an begen eng gab qen pitente mismisiramanei.
End ne ye mi e quraum eng munon ger ye nob qamara igub quraum. Yon qoan qamara igumon eng wotanamima. Sarau ye ebet igoum eng yonou tain eb qamara ebet igoum. Sarau eng ebine ne sarau eng wonou ye tain yiimurima derem eng animbiga.
Ne tain yiimurima derem eng wo gor yet dibes qamb igo. Ego an wo qob bais me igetet igoumon. Ne gor wo menman bais me gab igoumon.
Wo munon imurima derer eng an gab, munon ger qamb me wot oabigun qamb mag gari gab wogoumon end wonou qob eng anit me rama.
An bebereg igorub qamb qenen Qenu qob qoan gumatemir eng wanunger gab igoumon eng. Mai yourt qamamirei? Yet gari qamb gumatemirei.
End ne an yet yarab bebereg me igorun qamba at igoumon eng.”
Ende qamb qamar: “Ye Munangit ye unum bererimar qamb me darau.
Ye animbigoum, Qenu gor oau apand big me qenungoumon.
Ye tain wonomi wes eng ten derem ego an ye me yemusiaumon. Mai qiyo, munon bubun ger bo wonomi wes eng ten yar qob qamara igub igotounon qiyo, ye sir ue.
Aninou munon banam wurit qas mismisirub eng uter oboumon. A Qenu munon imurima derer eng wot mismisirau eng ue. Eng ebet wot maigas oabiguboumon?
Eng gab an ye aninou qomon eng taint dibes qemeriner qamb me yarimar. Munon aninou qomon dibes qemeriner eng Moses aninou qenunget igoumon eng.
An Moses qob eng apand mom oabigumanei ende qi eng qo yet oabigoumon qi. Moses wo qob qamb gumater eng yourt ue, yet qamb gumaterei.
End ne wo qob maigas at gumater eng an musub me oabig eng ye qob gor maigas imbig oabiguboumon,” ende qamarei.
Bais umi-umi wogub qen geret Yisas wo bo Yerusalem wogub ai Galili end diab ginam Taiberius end isorei. Isub tabin ba ya tai Galili purab ig iro isorei.
Yisas toar munon irou wurimusia uberet ne wonou sarau wes-wes eng aba gab wo eng isa munon yurau irou toat isumirei.
Yisas wo isuor eng is is wonou imbigau yurau eng wuri nob ai qaur ger ir end bugab igurei.
Qen end Yuda wurinou inorou qen aib gab mi aib at nub igour eng pi burab igoai.
Yisas ende bugab igo ne igeser munon yurau aib eng ibag ne wonou imbigau munon ger unum Pilip nob qamar: “Wa, munon yurau aib e mani eret gab taui ba wurisune nubour?”
(Yisas wo mi ebeiner eng qoan imbigor ego Pilip gag wariges nob qamarei).
Ende qamara Pilip taui qamar: “Wa, eng mai obouboun? In nomon qur qangang K200-ende ba mani parau taui ba werisun eng gor qeemben ue.”
Ende qamara wonou imbigau munon ger, unum Andru, wo Saimon Pita wonou umour, wo der Yisas nob qamar:
“Io, wau moi e wo mani parau 5-ende ne yagwai ombur-ombur ende igo. Ego munon yurau aib ete eng qeemben ue.”
Ende qamara Yisas der wonou imbigau yurau gugum wurinob qamar: “Munon yurau qamarari bugamunor.” Ende qamara qamarari misugan irou igoar end bugoramirei. Munon yurau aib eng gugum qangang 5,000-ende.
Ne Yisas mani parau eng ba Qenut uber qamb ne qerei munon bugoramir eng wuriserei. Ende at ne yagwai eng gor ba ende gari ebet wuriserei.
Wurisa mani yagwai eng nob qeemben niari qur uter igarerei. Ende at ne mani tatau wagari igama Yisas gab wonou wuri imbigau yurau eng wurinob qamar: “Mani tatau me isiorun, usisi baiar.”
Ende qamara usisi ba tugar 12-ende tugarimari diarei. Mani parau uben ig ue gari eng, bo nub tatau wagari tugariamir eng bo tugar 12-ende eng.
Munon yurau aib eng Yisas mani gari eng aba bo irou bura gab qamamir: “Io, munon mi qen geret yariner end qamb igo eng wo gari ag e dererei.”
Ende qamb duet nob igo wurinou baraitari maribigub qamb misir igari ion ibag ne end wuriwogub wonomai ai qaur end bo irarei.
Worom nerimb pisia ne wonou imbigau yurau eng ya tai end isub tabin ba Kaperneam end isub qamb isub igurei. Qataben isari-isari ituramorei. Qen end Yisas me wuri nob isau.
<range>
Isub igamari ne sanisani aib di ya bures ariramorei.
Ende aba is ya tai wobunobun isub gamir eng Yisas ya erer yar igoai. Gab igamari is tabin qani isa gab borusi yariamirei.
Ende abari Yisas der wuri nob qamar: “An me yarimar, ye gari yoroum.”
Ende qamar wuri ba mor bigub qamb abari tabin qand is ya gabut inerei.
Munon yurau aib eng wuriwogub isumir eng end inemirei. Mani wurisab igour qen end tabin gari qas igoar eng Yisas wonou imbigau yurau eng wurinou gari ba isumirei. Qen end Yisas wurinob isa me geau.
Urigerma ne Taiberius wurinou tabin ger Yisas mani Qenut qamb boat wurisab igoart end diab inerei.
Qen end Yisas wonou imbigau yurau wuri nob me igamari ibag, wuri bo tabin end isub qanam Yisas gub qamb Kaperneam end isumirei.
Ende is gamir eng Yisas igama gab nob qamamir: “Barai, ne qen mait e yarenei?”
Ende qamarari wo taui qamar: “Segagam aninob quraum, an ar mani eng nub gab ‘bo ar ende igumune bo ende aba nub igorun’ qamb ye toat qib igoumon. A yonou sarau eng ne ye your qi eng an imbigub qamb me yetoat yoroumon.
An mani apand nub gaumon end me asi qib igoarar, mani eng nub bo qand minemb igoumon. Mani nub qenen igomot igamau end asi gunon eng uber. Mani eng quraum eng Munangit wau andariba. Wonou Ur Qenu wot maribigorei.”
Ende qamara wuri qamamir: “In maigas at Qenu sarau eng obouboun?”
Ne Yisas qamar: “Qenu an sarau abar qamb qenungar eng ete: Wo munon imuriamor end mom wot oabigar qamb an qenungar igo. Ende obounon eng wonou sarau apand abari ende animbag an qenungariba.”
Ende qamara wuri bo taui qamamir: Ende gab eng ne mi wes ger maigas aba dibenara in gab net oabiguboun? Ne meimi sarau ebeiban?
Qoan ir ininou tonoanb seger ai end qib igo ne mana numirei. Eng Munon aib qob ete qamb gumatemirei igama wanunger igoun: “Qenu wonou ginamt end mani parau biga dara numirei.”
Ende qamarari Yisas taui qamar: “Segagam aninob quraum, mani parau eng Moses weriser eng Qenu ginamt end me darau, ue. A mani parau tain wonou ginamt imurima anit der igo eng mani parau apand. An nub qenen igomot igoruboumon.”
<range>
Ende qamara wuri qamamir: “Barai, mani eng qenen indara in nub igorub.”
Ne Yisas qamar: “Mani parau nub igomot igamau eng Ye gari. Munon ger yet oabig yariner eng me minemb ne gor yat me ebeinerei.
An ye qo yegaman end yet oabigomanei qamb animbagaum eng ue eng.
Tain munon yamangar yet qereiamor eng yet yarubour. Yarari ye wuri me qarausinei.
Ye Qenu ginam wogub derem eng munon wonou yiimurima derem eng wonou misir eng qas toat ebeibam, yonou misir end me ebeinei.
Munon ye yiimuriamor eng wo ye mi eb qamb qenunget igo eng ete: Wonou munon yurau yet imuriamor eng ye wuri me qarausinei, ue. Qen sindomund end bo wurimenimba.
Ger ete: Munon gugum wau eng gab wot oabigunor eng bebereg igamari qen sindomund end ye wurimenimbam,” ende qamarei.
Yisas qob eng qamar eng: “Mani parau Qenu ginam wogub derer eng Ye gari.” Eng qamara ne Yuda wuri misiringet nob agunub qamb etemirei.
Ende at ne wuri der qamamir: “Munon eng Yosep wonou wau. In gugum wonou ur Yosep ne unor Maria eng in qoyam. Ego wo bo der: ‘Ye Qenu ginamt igo deremei’, qura a?”
Ende qamb abari wo bo der taui qamar: “Meimet qamb aninou-aninou bo agunub igoumon?
Munon ger wonou uyes yet me yarinerei. Tain yiimurima derem eng wonou munon yet imurima yara ne ye qen sindomund end menimine igomot der bugemba.
Qenu qob gigit qamara munon gumatemir eng ete: ‘Qenu munon gugum wuriimbigiba’. Ende aba munon gugum wot qoyam imbig ne yet yar igour.
Qob eng qanam eng ete: Munangit ger Tain me geau, munon Qenu nob igo derer eng gari wonou Ur qoyam.”
Ende qamb qamar: “Segagam aninob quraum, an yet oabig eng qenen bebereg igoruboumon.
Munon bebereg igorub qamb mani nub igour eng ye gari.
Aninou tonoanb mani parau (mana) seger ai end qib nub qib igour eng umb uburemirei.
Ego mani parau see Qenu ginamt derer eng munon nub eng ger me uminerei.
Mani nub igomot igamau eng ye gari, Qenu ginam wogub deremei. Munon ger mani eng niner eng bebereg igoriba. Mani ye see werisibam eng yonou min. Ye ende wurisine nub eng munon ai qent gugum igomot igorubour.”
Ende qamara Yuda munon misiringet wurinou agunub qamamir: “Wa, munon eng maigas at wonou min eng indara in nuboun?”
Ne Yisas bo wurinob qamar: “Segagam aninob quraum, an yonou min nob yonou qeru nob me nub eng an igom me igurunanei.
Your yonou min qeru nob niner eng igomot igama qen sindomund end ye bo menimine der bugemba.
Yonou min eng mani apand ne yonou qeru eng ya apand.
Munon ger yonou min ne qeru nob nub eng wo ye yenob igama ne ye gor wo nob igoribam.
Tain igom igo eng yiimurima derem end ye wot bebereg igoum. End ne munon ger ye min eng nub eng yet wo bebereg igoriba.
End ne mani parau Qenu ginamt derer eng mani parau qoan dara tonoanb nub qib igour gas ende ue. Wuri mani parau eng numir eng ger bebereg et igamari me ibagaun, ue. A munon ger ye mani parau see quraum eng nub eng qenen igomot igoriba.”
Yisas qob eng wurinob qamb igoar eng Kaperneam inorou munai mor end.
Yisas qob eng ende wurinob qamara wonou munon yurau wo qob igub taut qib igour eng irou der wurinou misirt qamamir: “Ne qob eng at quran eng qob soagen ur, your ger qob eng igub io me qemerinerei.”
Ende misir igub abari Yisas wuriimbig ne wuri nob qamar: “Qob e quraum end an yesiningot wogub qamb misir igoumon?
Ende gab Munangit wau wonou qoan igoi wogub derer munai sambur end bo iroa an mai obouboumon?
Qenu Igomurur qau munon opuri igama wo git igom igo. Munangit wonou qer gagam big igom igorib qamb ebeiner eng misue. End ne qob e ye aninob quraum eng igub oabig eng Igomurur qau anit isa apand igom igoruboumon.
End ne an yurau erogori end an qei yet oa me bigoumon.” Eng qoan Yisas qanambig sarau bea munon qei wot oa me bigau eng imbigorei. Ne gor wurinou yurau erogori end munon ger qen geret Yisas munon qarau wurit duima waramunor eng gor qo imbigorei.
Ne Yisas qob eng qamb wogub bo qamar: “Eng gab ne aninob quraum, Tain munon ger me nonogursieriner eng munon eng ye me yetoainerei,” ende qamarei.
Yisas qob eng ende wurinob qamara wogub wonou yurau qei se-se yarari imbig wurinob qib igoar eng irou wogub bo me nob qib igamau.
Ende wogub qoari ne wonou yurau qeemben 12-ende eng gari wurinob qamar: “An gor ye yewogub qoaub misir igoumon?”
Ende qamara Saimon Pita der taui qamar: “Barai, in ne newogub in your nob qib igoruboun? In niimbigoun, ne qob eng in bebereg igamau werei eng.
In mom niimbigoun, ne Qenu wonou munon sig uber ar.”
Ende qamara Yisas taui wuri nob qamar: “Mai gas, an munon yurau 12-eng ye anmaribigomei qiyo? An yonou anmaribigom ego an yurau end gari qas aibigau opurimorei ten igo.”
Yisas wo eng qamar eng Yudas Saimon Iskariot wonou wau end qamarei. Yudas Iskariot wo Yisas wonou munon yurau 12-ende erogori wuri qereiamor eng bo qen geret munon qarau wurit duima waramunor eng qo imbig ne wurinob qamb igoai.
Eng ende wurinob qamb wogub bo ai Galili end is qib igoai. Qen end Yuda munon baraitari mom waramb abari ibag bo ai Yudia end me is qib igamau.
